channel.title: Dinner in America on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Dinner in America on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Carolina Caroline’: Adam Carter Rehmeier Previews His Samara Weaving Outlaw Romance Ahead of TIFF
item.description: The director, whose varied credits include the controversial ‘The Bunny Game,’ cult hit ‘Dinner in America’ and underseen gem ‘Snack Shack,’ says his Toronto entry is his most commercial film.
